Plot: Twenty-something Ana, now living in Buenos Aires, returns to her native city of Paraná. She meets old school mates, old friends, makes new ones, and starts to rethink her life, and perhaps changes her future forever.
starring: Juan Cruz Díaz la Barba Natacha Massera
Release: The film premiered in Argentina on 21 April 2003 and premiered in over 10 major countries worldwide.
